title: The Relationship Shoppe
description: "A delightful, engrossing read." -- Midwest Book Review. Marian Sheffield longs to climb out of the pits, but before she can transform her career and romantic life, she must contend with the indiscretions of Belle, her business partner and best friend. Along the way, Marian learns the difference between a crush on her guy friend and the very real advances of her company’s investor—and how to apply the relationship advice she promotes in her own bookstore.
author: Susan Paulson Clark
